creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Characters\' names written aside each figure: {Matasuke nyo_bo_} (wife) | {Odai} (woman on floor) | {Yasuda Sho_ji} (man holding sword) | {Fune no sato[?] Matasuke} (man with bamboo stick) | {Eishuya tedai} (servant) | {Ko_suke} (man with a gold bird) | {Kagaya musume} (daughter) | {Oei} (woman standing)
markings: red artist\'s toshidama seal | censor seals: {Muramatsu} | {Fukushima} | publisher\'s seal: {Yama ta} [unknown]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R, L: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga} | center:  一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
title: (Five People in a Room by a River from an Unidetified Kabuki Play)
